您确定要退出登录吗？: Are you sure you want to logout?
睡觉时是否有磨牙、打呼噜等习惯: Sleep habits like grinding teeth, snoring, etc.
为了更好地进行算法匹配，请完善您的匹配信息: To better match algorithms, please complete your matching information
点击查看你的专属算法推荐室友: Click to view your personalized algorithm-recommended roommates
由队长提交心仪的宿舍，可以从收藏中选择，组队信息在抢宿舍阶段不可变更: The team leader submits the desired dormitory, which can be selected from the favorites. The team information cannot be changed during the dormitory grabbing phase.
抢宿舍阶段已结束，如果您还没有宿舍，您可以选择剩余的宿舍，但请先自己创建或加入一: The dormitory grabbing phase has ended. If you still don't have a dormitory, you can choose from the remaining dormitories, but please create or join a team with less than full members first.
